Articles.Content:
I've been trying to make ksprc work, but it simply wont... the planets have the same texture as the vanilla would have, it doesn't have any shaders of some sort.

Tried:

*Reinstalling

*Uninstalling

*Deleting mods

 

HELP ME PLEASE!

On 6.8.2016 at 11:36 AM, Duck Kerbal said:

HELP ME PLEASE!

The mod hasn't been updated to 1.1.3, which is why it isn't working on 1.1.3.

However, you're in luck. Since Renaissance Compilation is, in effect, just a collection of assets and config files for other mods, that means that Renaissance Compilation itself doesn't need an update. But those other mods it uses to run, those most definitely do. RC ships all these mods bundled in its download, for easy installation; but since RC hasn't updated, all of those bundled dependencies are now out of date. You need to manually replace them all with updated versions.

For additional assistance, ask here:

For additional assistance, ask here:

 

Okay thanks I'll try it today

 

Here's a drink for kerbal kind

Edit: Is kopernicus still up? It seems like i can only access and download kopernicus expansion...

Edited August 8, 2016 by Duck Kerbal

The Kopernicus thread randomly vanished into thin air in May. Nobody really knows why. It's possible that the link in the KSPRC thread opener points to the old, dead link.

Of course, Kopernicus itself is alive and well, and they made a new thread here:
